name: Elemental (TeamBorkStudio)
description:
Elemental is a 2D Endless Runner for Android  created by Team Bork. Help Eli escape the mad scientists and cross the obstacles with his new acquired powers!

Story 

This story is about a girl named Eli,  she is a 16 year old, who was born into a poor family. Her father was a carpenter and mother was a nurse. They lived in the city of New York, and life there was not easy for the people who were just trying to get by. Eli had a job at the local grocery and one day on the way back home, Eli gets kidnapped by a bunch of men due to her curiosity. These men sell Eli to a mad scientist named Dr. Mentel. After they leave, The doctor begins to run experiments on Eli, by injecting liquid lightning, liquid fire and liquid laser into her. When they test out how these things affect a person, they found out that she had the ability to conjure an orb around her that was related to a particular element that was injected into her. She has the power to summon lightning, fire and laser shields that would protect her from those particular elements. One day Eli gets loose and tries to escape but while escaping comes across obstacles placed to stop her from doing so, but each one was an element that she had a shield of, so she could escape but the shield would only stay for half a second, so she had to time it properly and she begins to escape the facility.

Game Concept

Elemental is 2D Endless Runner Game made on Unity. The Game is based on a story of a 16 year old girl named Eli. The Objective of the Game is to escape from the kidnappers who had abducted Eli and performed experiments on her. She has to escape the facility, but the place is full of obstacles and machines that shoot out lasers, fire and  lightning, luckily for Eli, the experiments now allow her to use the powers of lasers, fire and lightning where she summons a shield of said element. Using these new abilities she has to get free, but the powers come at a cost as they are active for only 0.5 seconds and cannot be used for another Gems seconds. Along the escape route there are Gems that have been experimented with a drug, that can be collected to help Eli’s family get out of poverty. 

Obstacles

Go past the following obstacles with its appropriate shield to survive for as long as possible.

1. Laser

2. Lightning

3. Fire

Gems 

The more gems that are collected, the faster Eli runs! as these gems have been induced with a drug that enhances the physical abilities. With these Eli can escape the scientists.
